Medium Undead, Chaotic Evil
Lacedon Ghoul
Lacedons are loose-skinned, aquatic ghouls. They often arise from the corpses of greedy pirates, those who starved on deserted islands, or scoundrels who
met their end by drowning.
Gibbering Mouther
Ravenous Chorus of Unreality
Habitat: Underdark; Treasure: None
Gibbering mouthers endlessly feed on and regrow their own amoeboid bodies—amorphous heaps roiling with eyes, teeth, and strange organs. These mind-
bending terrors sing and scream, laugh and cry with a cacophony of voices ranging from disturbingly unnatural to shockingly familiar. They exist only to
feed and to unleash their disdain for reality, their many maws dripping with otherworldly spittle.
Gibbering mouthers come into being in various unpleasant ways. Roll on or choose a result from the Gibbering Mouther Nascencies table to inspire what
brought one of these horrors into being.
